# SubTranslate

> A web application that uses Google Gemini AI to translate movie subtitle files (.srt) with a focus on preserving natural tone, emotion, and pacing. Supports 100+ languages with intelligent subtitle formatting.

SubTranslate is a modern React-based subtitle translation tool that leverages Google's Gemini AI to provide high-quality, emotionally-aware translations of movie and video subtitles. The application preserves timing codes, formatting, and cinematic flow while delivering natural-sounding translations.

## Features

- [AI-Powered Translation](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Powered by Google Gemini AI for contextually-aware subtitle translation
- [Multi-Language Support](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Supports 100+ source and target languages
- [SRT Format Support](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Full support for standard .subtitle files with timing codes
- [Preserve Formatting](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Maintains subtitle positioning, styling, and timing information
- [Natural Tone Translation](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Focuses on emotional fidelity and cinematic flow
- [Drag & Drop Interface](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Easy file upload with intuitive user experience
- [Progressive Web App](https://subtitletranslator.varabit.com/): Installable PWA with offline capabilities

## Technical Details

- Built with React 19 and TypeScript
- Uses Vite for fast development and optimized builds
- Integrates with Google Gemini AI API for translation
- Tailwind CSS for responsive design
- Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities
- No server-side rendering - client-side SPA architecture

- Video content localization
